description: SongSecure helps musicians protect their music with affordable copyright options.

faqs.question: How does SongSecure protect my music?
faqs.answer: SongSecure registers your music with copyright protections to ensure your work is legally protected.

faqs.question: What types of files are supported?
faqs.answer: We support MP3, WAV, and other common audio formats.

faqs.question: Can I update my submission?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can submit revisions for free at any time.

faqs.question: How much does it cost?
faqs.answer: We offer a variety of plans starting at $9.99 per month.

support.hours: Monday - Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM EST

testimonials.name: John D.
testimonials.comment: SongSecure made protecting my music so easy and affordable!

testimonials.name: Maria S.
testimonials.comment: I love how fast I was able to secure my new album!
